lux.vizLib.altair.AltairChart module¶

class lux.vizLib.altair.AltairChart.AltairChart(view)[source]¶

Bases: object

AltairChart is a representation of a chart. Common utilities for charts that is independent of chart types should go here.

addTooltip()[source]¶
